original_text: And he shall lay his hand on the head of his offering and kill it at the entrance of the tent of meeting, and Aaron's sons the priests shall throw the blood against the sides of the altar.
korean_text: 그 예물의 머리에 안수하고 회막 문에서 잡을 것이요 아론의 자손 제사장들은 그 피를 제단 사방에 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he shall lay his hand on the head of his offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 제물의 머리 위에 손을 얹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and kill it at the entrance of the tent of meeting
and Aaron's sons the priests shall throw the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 아론의 아들들인 제사장들은 피를 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: against the sides of the altar.
